items.name: Alpaca
items.other_info: Nestled in soft, huggable fur, this adorable stuffed animal features big, round eyes that sparkle with innocence, capturing hearts at first glance.

items.name: Cow
items.other_info: Its fuzzy ears perk up inquisitively, adding an extra touch of charm to this endearing stuffed creature, making it irresistibly cute and delightful.

items.name: Turkey
items.other_info: With a velvety touch and an enchanting expression, this lovable stuffed companion is a heartwarming reminder that even the smallest cuddles can bring immense joy.
